normalised: Want to know if your Instagram reels are truly vibing with your audience, you know? Forget just likes; it's all about follower analytics now! Experts at I I M Ahmedabad are saying deep diving into metrics is crucial, especially for brands targeting the Gen-Z crowd.

unnormalised: Want to know if your Instagram reels are truly vibing with your audience, ya know? Forget just likes; it's all about follower analytics now! Experts at IIM Ahmedabad are saying deep diving into metrics is crucial, especially for brands targeting the Gen-Z crowd.
normalised: Are those sponsored posts for your momo shop in Lajpat Nagar actually converting? Follower analytics tools can show you everything from age demographics to peak engagement times. Knowing when Priya from Chennai is most likely scrolling is pure gold!

unnormalised: Are those sponsored posts for your momo shop in Lajpat Nagar actually converting? Follower analytics tools can show you everything from age demographics to peak engagement times. Knowing when Priya from Chennai is most likely scrolling is pure gold!
normalised: Doctor Sharma, a leading digital marketing guru, emphasizes that simply boasting about ten thousand followers is passé. It's about quality, not quantity! Are those followers real, or just bots inflating your numbers? Analytics help identify those fake profiles.

unnormalised: Dr. Sharma, a leading digital marketing guru, emphasizes that simply boasting about 10K followers is passé. It's about quality, not quantity! Are those followers real, or just bots inflating your numbers? Analytics help identify those fake profiles.
normalised: Think of it like this: you wouldn’t buy a five hundred square foot office without knowing the foot traffic, right? Same applies to your social media presence. Invest in understanding your audience; it’ll save you rupees in the long run and boost your brand like a Diwali rocket!

unnormalised: Think of it like this: you wouldn’t buy a 500 sq ft office without knowing the foot traffic, right? Same applies to your social media presence. Invest in understanding your audience; it’ll save you Rs. in the long run and boost your brand like a Diwali rocket!
